name: Fun Bot Mayhem
description:
Fun Bot Mayhem  a First Person Shooter, robotic fun! Solo or Multiplayer Games

Play solo matches with bots or better yet join up with friends and then add more bots!

Multiple game modes:

  • Free For All
  • Capture the Flag
  • Rush
  • Team Deathmatch
  • Capture Objective (Conquest / King of the Hill)

No subscriptions!  No in-game purchases! No micro transactions! Any future updates will be included in the game.

Multiplayer Requirements

Multiplayer is peer to peer; meaning this game works with others best with friends.  There is no main server or matchmaking - just find a game, join, and play!  

Online Multiplayer doesn't require logging in to an Epic Games Account.  This game uses Epic Online Services for matchmaking and peer-to-peer connections.  If you want to play using invite only private sessions then you and your friends need to login to Epic Account Services.  Follow the prompts in-game to link your Epic Account with this game.

Starting The Game

Using the itch.io app, install both the game and the "EpicOnlineServicesInstaller.exe" once the "EpicOnlineServicesInstaller.exe" is installed click "Launch."  You need this installer even if you have the Epic Games Store installed.  This installer verifies and configures Epic Games Services to run outside of the Epic Games Store.

Once the installer finishes you can "launch" the game.  You should only need to run the installer once.  If you uninstall the game then it is safe to also uninstall the "EpicOnlineServicesInstaller.exe".

System Requirements
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Drive Space: 2GB
  • Processor: minimum 64-bit, 4 core, multi-threaded AMD or Intel
  • GPU must support hardware ray tracing
    • GPU AMD: minimum Radeon™ RX 6000 Series
    • GPU NVIDIA: minimum GeForce RTX 20 series (RTX 2060 )
  • System Memory: minimum 8GB, recommend at least 16GB

Try the demo game for free.  The demo game doesn't have multiplayer and only has two maps to play on.  However you can play those maps with bots for as long as you like.  There will  be bugs in the demo as it doesn't match the current state of the game.  The demo is mostly there to test that this game will run on your hardware.

Data Policy

We don't store your player data - that's why we're using Epic Games services!  The game does get access to your Epic username and your friends who also have this same game.  The in-game chat is not recorded by the game; however other players might be recording.  Since we can't control what other players might do, please keep the chat friendly!
